name: incorporate
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to include something as part of something larger

example.eg: Suggestions from the survey have been incorporated into/in the final design.
example.egtrans: 调查中取得的建议已被纳入了最终的设计之中。

example.eg: This aircraft incorporates several new safety features.
example.egtrans: 这种飞机具有几种新的安全特征。
